name: Leg compartment release — Anterior
text: Anterior leg compartment release decompresses the anterior compartment of the leg and relieves pressure on muscles and neurovascular structures.

name: Leg compartment release — Lateral
text: Lateral leg compartment release decompresses the lateral compartment of the leg to treat elevated compartment pressures.

name: Leg compartment release — Superficial posterior
text: Superficial posterior leg compartment release decompresses the superficial posterior compartment to relieve compartment syndrome.

name: Leg compartment release — Deep posterior
text: Deep posterior leg compartment release decompresses the deep posterior compartment and protects critical neurovascular structures.
